pullrequest.title: pr2_mechanism is not a package, this breaks [tutorial](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=drcsim_control_sync&cat=drcsim)

content.raw:
I will take care of that. One more thing:

```
atlas_bringup.launch:  <include file="$(find pr2_controller_manager)/controller_manager.launch" />
atlas_bringup.launch:        pkg="pr2_controller_manager" type="spawner" output="log"
atlas_v3_bringup.launch:  <include file="$(find pr2_controller_manager)/controller_manager.launch" />
atlas_v3_bringup.launch:        pkg="pr2_controller_manager" type="spawner" output="log"
```

pr2_controller_manager is being us by our bringup launch files.
